attributes.action: Rioters And Their Families Should Not Be Evicted From Their Council Homes
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that evicting rioters from their council homes will create more problems than it will resolve.  It is an unjust measure as the convicted will be subject to double-punishment, one from the courts and a second from their local council. This will devastate both families and communities and is not a viable long-term solution to the issue of social unrest.
We call on the Government to reverse this decision with immediate effect.
